text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: So, it's settled! We'll be havin' our<n>singin' lessons...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Wh-whoa! The blue sky, the white<n>clouds, this indescribable
scent of the<n>wild! Why?! Oh, WHY?! Answer me,<n>Shiraoki!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Oh! Scarlet, get a load of that bull overthere! It's huge! Man, I wannagrab those handlebar horns and driveit around like a motorcycle!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
This isn't the time to be messing<n>around! We're supposed
to be having<n>a rehearsal! Ugh, I knew something<n>smelled
fishy once we got on that<n>train...

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
No, no, there's a good reason I<n>brought y'all this far! I
heard the<n>venue for the commemorative concert<n>is gonna
be enormous!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
That's why we're here at this big ol'<n>ranch where we can
practice singin'<n>big and loud!
